title: Neural Logic: Bridging Symbolic Reasoning and Gradient Descent
authors: Tanvir Rahman, A. Smith, J. Doe
abstract: This paper explores the integration of symbolic logic into neural network architectures to improve interpretability and logical consistency in large language models.

title: Procedural Aesthetics: Reactive GLSL Paradigms in Modern Web Art
abstract: An investigation into high-performance shader techniques for creating immersive, reactive generative art in browser-based environments.

title: Attention Is All You Need
abstract: The seminal paper introducing the Transformer architecture, replacing recurrent layers with self-attention mechanisms.

title: The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Recurrent Neural Networks
abstract: A legendary exploration of the capabilities of RNNs in generating text and code.

title: Deconvolution and Checkerboard Artifacts
abstract: An interactive explanation of how deconvolution layers can cause artifacts in generated images.
